pageProduct.name: Sukin For Men Body Wash 500ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Say hello to our natural Men's Range, formulated specifically for Men's skin! Our Body Wash For Men is created with Aloe Vera, Baobab Extract, Sesame and Jojoba Oils to clean and hydrate the body. A masculine blend of Cinnamon and Citrus refreshes the senses

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes and rinse immediately if contact occurs. If irritation occurs rinse immediately and discontinue use. For external use only.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Decyl Glucoside, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, PEG-150 Pentaerythrityl Tetrastearate, Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil (Baobab), Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Cinnamomum Zeylanicum Bark Oil (Cinnamon), Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil, Piper Nigrum (Pepper) Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene*, Cinnamal*. *Natural Component of Essential Oil

Directions

After cleansing, gently massage a small amount into face and neck. Use once or twice daily
